name: Miniature Against Bacteria
description:
Move with a, x, b, p, each moves you to their corresponting diagonal direction. Shooting is automatic.

Your mission is to defeat all the evil bacteria (that's the plural of "bacterium") with your slightly unreliable shrank submarine. 80 of them.
Don't let your durability drop below zero.

Entry in Mini Jam 74: Chaos
Limitation: Game must only use a specific set of keys (A  X  Space  P  8  B)

//TODO postjam: outline for text - white with black or other way around;
with '8' reverse thruster control to direction control
